data.actual_result: Discord tries to commit the changes and locks up the CPU a fair bit, disabling use of other buttons, forcing you to close it in task manager.
data.expected_result: Discord should either commit the changes, or have a filesize limit on avatars, like messages do.
data.short_description: Uploading a large .GIF as server avatar locks up CPU.
data.steps_to_repro: - Download the attached .GIF file (23MB) - Try and upload the .GIF as a server avatar.
